p: Change in BPI scores from baseline also did not differ significantly between the groups for those receiving any maintenance therapy versus no maintenance therapy ( P = 0.81) and those receiving lenalidomide-only maintenance therapy versus no maintenance therapy ( P = 0.42; Fig. 7a and b; Table 7 [Online Resource 1]). BPI decreased significantly from pre-ASCT (analytic baseline) to follow-up for the groups receiving any maintenance therapy and lenalidomide-only maintenance therapy and significantly increased at progression for all groups ( P < 0.001; Fig. 7c [Online Resource 1]).
